logoutMessage: Are you sure, you want to logout from the ClearVue app?
confirmingInformationProvided: I can confirm I understood the information provided
doNotUnderstand: I do not understand and require more training
loginAlertMsg: You may receive communication content in your message feeds within The ClearVue app from representatives within the Company in which your agency has placed you to work on assignment under the contract you have signed with your agency. The purpose of any such communication is to create an inclusive work culture and ensure you experience a positive work environment. These communications do not construe any contractual relationship or any co-employment relationship between you and the end Company, you remain under contract with your agency and no other contract is formed by receiving such communications.
acceptTermsPrivacyPolicy: Please accept Terms and Privacy Policy
fulltimeWorker: Are you a Full Time Worker?
errSocialSecurity: Social security number must contain alpha-numeric character
errValidSocialSecurity: Enter a valid social security number
errPasswordLength: Password length should be 8 character or more
errPasswordNotMatch: Password & confirmed password does not match
errSWW: Something went wrong, please try again
noDataFoundAllFeed:
Thank you for downloading the ClearVue app and welcome to your new community!

Your profile isn't quite ready yet, but please check in again very soon to start receiving regular updates and messages from your workplace and colleagues.

You are a valued member of our team!
noDataFoundCpny:
Thank you for downloading the ClearVue app and welcome to your new community!

 The company haven't set this area up yet, but please check in again very soon to start receiving regular updates and messages from your workplace and colleagues.

You are a valued member of our team!
onBoardingScreen1SubTitle: This app has been built to help you have the best work experience possible and to help you feel part of an extended work community. The social pages will provide you with all the communications from your placement and agency. Scroll through the introduction pages so you are familiar with the features and benefits. Staying Anonymous Survey feedback can not be traced back to you and can not be viewed by ClearVue or anyone else.
onBoardingScreen2SubTitle: This is your digital CV that shows all your key information and automatically records and stores your work history, achievements, including skills & training, recognition and awards badges.
onBoardingScreen3SubTitle:
Your feedback is valued and important. Take surveys to rate the experience of your agency and place of work, helping you to create a great working environment for everyone.
Pay Query surveys allow you to raise concerns with your pay to help get these resolved.
onBoardingScreen4SubTitle:
This is where your work and agency communications come together in one place.
Easily keeping up to date and connected with your colleagues via the message boards and receiving personal recognition messages.
onBoardingScreen5SubTitle: The support section provides links to trusted organisations that can help and keep you safe.
